name: DEMON'S FORGE
description:
PLEASE PLAY THIS GAME IN FULLSCREEN MODE
ALSO, GIVE IT A MINUTE OR SO TO LOAD, THE GAME IS HUGE

This is a rebuild of a classic text+graphics adventure game I used to play as a kid on the Apple ][ (just like Planet Of The Robots). Yes this game is a distant ancestor of the 2010 game Hunted: Demon's Forge: it was the debut game of Brian Fargo, the founder of InExile Entertainment.

The original had graphics programmed by Rebeccah Heineman, so recreating this game was not only a nod to my childhood, but also the history of trans women gamedevs.
